On the first day of the class (Mo. 28.08) there will be interactive presentations covering an introduction to reproductive biology, this will be done as a mental warm-up.
- The subjects need to be researched (some links given) but it does not need to be academicly deep, recommended time of preparation is 90 minutes.
- The topic needs to be presented in max 5 minutes followed by questions.

Pictures and graphics will be pinned on poster boards, the pictures need to be seen and understood at 1.5m. We can print the visuals for you. Please let us know (schoen@izw-berlin.de) latest until 24.08. if you need assistance.
The presentations are meant to open up dialog and clear up any inquiries in a casual setting.
